meta.title: EPP Programs - Environmental Protection - FlorenceEGI
meta.description: Discover Environmental Protection Programs (EPP): how every EGI contributes to verified reforestation, plastic recycling and bee protection projects.
meta.keywords: EPP, environment, sustainability, reforestation, plastic recycling, bees, green blockchain, FlorenceEGI

hero.title: Environmental Protection Programs
hero.subtitle: The Green Heart of Every EGI
hero.description: Each EGI automatically allocates a share to verified environmental projects. It's not marketing, it's in every certificate's DNA.

arf.title: ARF - Adopt and Regenerate Forests
arf.description: The ARF program is dedicated to regenerating Italian forest heritage and protecting existing forests.

apr.title: APR - Adopt Plastic and Recycle
apr.description: The APR program focuses on recovering plastic from oceans, beaches and urban areas, transforming it into new resources.

bpe.title: BPE - Bee Protection & Education
bpe.description: The BPE program is dedicated to protecting bees and pollinators, fundamental for biodiversity and agriculture.

howItWorks.title: How Contribution Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From your purchase to real impact

steps.title: Transaction
steps.description: Every time you buy, sell or trade an EGI, a percentage is automatically allocated to EPP.

steps.title: Collection
steps.description: Funds are collected in a dedicated pool managed transparently.

steps.title: Distribution
steps.description: Periodically funds are distributed to projects based on priorities and impact.

steps.title: Verification
steps.description: Results are verified and published on blockchain for total transparency.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.description: Every EGI you buy or create contributes to making the world a better place.
